locutie.beschrijving: The preacher explains the image of Christ knocking at the door, contrasting it with human 'seeking' and linking the 'I Am' of Exodus to the 'I Am' of the Gospels and Revelation.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Strong. Connects the text to the 'I Am' formula and the historical context of the Seven Churches.

illocutie.beschrijving: The sermon begins with Assertives (explaining the text) but shifts into intense Directives and Commissives in the final third.
voorbeelden: I stand at the door and knock (Asserting/Quoting)

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To move the hearer from passive listening to an active opening of the 'heart's door' through trust.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Yes, explicitly prays that hearers hear 'the Lord's voice' rather than the preacher's.

voorbeelden: The idea of an absent God is a concept out of which Luther made almost a theological doctrine.
This passage in Revelation completes who God is in history.
He was dead and am alive forevermore.
I hope all of us will be in our places.
Oh, my God, how quick we ought to be to answer him.
I will come in to him.
I will give you my peace.
I'll give you a new song in your life.
commissieven.kwaliteit: High. The preacher speaks on behalf of Christ, using the first person 'I' to deliver divine promises.

voorbeelden: This is God's best news, knocking at your door.
This is the gospel in the flesh.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher declares the identity of the moment as a 'happening' of the Gospel.

indicatoren: Lengthy digression on fatherhood and role models.
Historical anecdotes about Baptist revival meetings.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual engagement and social reflection, but a temporary pause in the 'event' of the text.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Very high; uses the 'I will' of Christ to address the hearer directly.
voorbeelden: Give me your weakness, and I will give you my strength.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Mix of preacher's personal anecdotes and Christ's 'I' in the promises.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the congregation ('You say to me', 'Open the door').
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Strongly used in the final appeal.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Used for biblical history (Moses, Pharaoh) and theological concepts (Luther).
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a narrative foundation before the direct address.

actueel_present.gebruik: The immediate 'knocking' of Christ in the sermon moment.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the Assertive (Who is knocking?) to the Commissive (What He will do) to the Directive (Open the door).
voorbeelden: I am Jesus who knocks (Assertive) -> I will give you my peace (Commissive) -> Trust him (Directive).
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Excellent transition from information to encounter.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: He has a thousand blessings in his hand (Indicative). Open the door (Imperative).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon successfully moves beyond 'talking about' the door to becoming the 'voice' of the one knocking.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Give me your confusion, and I will give you my peace.
sterke_punten.effect: Creates a direct exchange between Christ and the hearer.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The section on brick-yard workers and Truman Capote.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Momentarily breaks the illocutionary tension of the 'knocking'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon becomes an event when the preacher stops describing the 'I Am' and starts speaking for the 'I Am'.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The use of the 'Toezegging' (Promise) is robust and central.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Yes, the preacher explicitly aims for the hearer to hear 'the Lord's voice'.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Yes, especially in the final sequence of promises.
tekstueel_bewijs: I pray... not my poor voice but the Lord's.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Implicitly through the prayer for hearing.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, the preacher acknowledges he cannot make them believe, only present the knocker.
tekstueel_bewijs: I hope all of you will hear... the Lord's.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the sermon is treated as the actual 'knocking' of Christ.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Yes, the litany of 'I Am' titles creates an epiphany.
tekstueel_bewijs: The great I Am is knocking at your door.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is well-balanced, though the middle section is heavy on third-person historical assertives.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The idea of an absent God is a concept...
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: You may feel God is absent, but He is here.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a lecture on Luther to a direct address of the hearer's experience.

toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Maintain the current strength of the final commissives.
voorbeeldzinnen: Christ is here now to give you peace.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: The digression on social models loses the 'You' of the congregation.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Bridge the social commentary back to the illocutionary force of the text more quickly.
voorbeeldzinnen: Even in your search for a model, it is Christ who knocks.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: The foundation of the command 'Open' in the promise 'I will come in' is perfect.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful example of how a sermon can transition from a lecture into a sacramental event through the use of commissive language.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: Unlike SvT, which would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' about his father, SAT focuses on the 'Divine Act' of the promise being delivered.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power here is not in the 'Rose of Sharon' metaphors (rhetoric) but in the 'I will' (illocution).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's climax is not the information about Revelation 3:20, but the performative 'Toezegging' at the end.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: I will come in to him.
The Door is now knocking at the door.

appendices.notities: The preacher uses the 'I Am' litany to build authority for the final commissives.
